name: Candlelight VR
description:
Find your way to the exit of this locked room by interacting with your environment and solving puzzles.

You can choose two different modes: 

  • VR-Friendly Movement: teleport around the scene and rotate in 45 degrees intervals.
  • Fluid Movement: move and rotate freely. Warning: it may cause dizziness.

Project made by Lyhdyr and Sergi for Advanced Interaction Techniques course from Universitat de Girona (2022-2023)
